verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees אֵ֭לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> unto נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> Unto thee lift I up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י <S%H3427><s%> O thou that dwellest בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְעֵינֵ֪י <S%H5869><s%> Behold as the eyes עֲבָדִ֡ים <S%H5650><s%> of servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> [look] unto the hand אֲ‍ֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H113><s%> of their masters כְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> [and] as the eyes שִׁפְחָה֮ <S%H8198><s%> of a maiden אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַ֪ד <S%H3027><s%> unto the hand גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ <S%H1404><s%> of her mistress כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So עֵ֭ינֵינוּ <S%H5869><s%> so our eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [wait] upon the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God עַ֝֗ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁיְּחָנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2603><s%> until that he have mercy

חָנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H2603><s%> Have mercy יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> upon us O LORD חָנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H2603><s%> have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַ֝֗ב <S%H7227><s%> upon us for we are exceedingly שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ <S%H7646><s%> filled בֽוּז׃ <S%H937><s%> with contempt

רַבַּת֮ <S%H7227><s%> is exceedingly שָֽׂבְעָה־ <S%H7646><s%> filled לָּ֪הּ נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ <S%H5315><s%> Our soul הַלַּ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> with the scorning הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <S%H7600><s%> of those that are at ease הַ֝בּ֗וּז <S%H937><s%> [and] with the contempt לִגְאֵ֥יוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H1349><s%> of the proud
